input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product keywords and product name.

Product name:
Nike Men's Fly 9-Inch Shorts,Royal,3XL

Product keywords:
100% polyester
two side pockets
zippered pocket on the back right
Brushed waistband with draw cord
Dri-FIT circular knit body fabric
Swoosh logo is heat-transferred at the bottom of the left leg
9.25 inseam (Size Medium)

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Look fly when you hit the field wearing these Men's Fly 9-Inch Shorts from Nike. These Dri-FIT shorts have two side pockets with a zippered pocket on the back right. The brushed waistband has a drawcord. These are made from 100% polyester. The Nike Swoosh logo is heat-transferred at the bottom of the left leg.
input_text.Response B: The Nike Men's Fly 9-Inch Shorts are perfect for any outdoor activity. Made from 100% polyester, these shorts are lightweight and comfortable. They feature two side pockets and a zippered pocket on the back right. A brushed waistband with draw cord provides a secure fit. The Dri-FIT circular knit body fabric helps keep you dry and comfortable. The Swoosh logo is heat-transferred at the bottom of the left leg. With a 9.25-inch inseam, these shorts will hit just above the knee. The Nike Men's Fly 9-Inch Shorts are perfect for any activity, whether it's running, playing basketball, or hanging out with friends.
